page.title: 12Denmead Sub-Power Station.
page.content: A very visible feature on the skyline of this area is the Southern Electricity Generating Board's (S.E.G.B.) Lovedean Sub-Power Station. This can be seen from most parts of our area. We asked the S.E.G.B. for information about the sub-station but they did not give it to us so there is very little that we can say about this feature. However, we can say that it is the main junction for power for much of south-east Hampshire. It does bring down the rates for the homeowners of Denmead. Many people would claim that this is not a pleasing sight in such enjoyable countryside and spoils the environment. A feature that has such an effect on the people of this area could not go without mention.
